name: Lock-N-Load
description:
A Top-Down versus Shooter game !

You can play with you friends (2 - 4 player) for some epic versus fights !

Choose your own map style !

(choose presset or save your own)

Play with your friends !

(from 2 to 4 players)

Controls

Video Demo soon !

This game is still being develloped, many features will come (like a zombie mode and a campaign), be patient :)
